level.heading: REQUIRED REGISTRATION FOR MASTER BUSINESS LICENSE (ยง 17-8905)

level.text: Unless exempt under section 47-2851.2 of the District of Columbia Official Code, each person who files a trade name application shall have a master business license or concurrently file a master business license application.

If an applicant for a trade name registration is required to have a master business license, the trade name registration shall not be issued until a master business license application has been approved.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 10075 (November 8, 2002).
